attributes.action: We need a national inquiry in to the grooming gangs scandal in Great Britain.
attributes.additional_details: Our children need protecting and ALL those that failed to protect children brought to justice. Children are precious and are our future.
attributes.background: I want the government to sanction a full public inquiry in to the grooming gangs scandal.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:

Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
